General Features
Rugged, versatile platform - ideal for on-line and in-line process applications
Spectral sensitivity to 1850 nm addresses a large portfolio of applications and samples with higher performance
Field-proven semiconductor device technology enables maintenance-free operation
Low power consumption for longest-life battery operation
Proprietary WARM™ Wavelength/Amplitude Referencing Module ensures calibration transfer
High-speed data acquisition for real-time measurements
Maintenance-free operation, embedded calibration, and universal platform drastically reduce regulatory costs
IntegraSpec XL products - NIR Spectroscopy for general process applications
The IntegraSpec XL addresses many NIR PAT applications in monitoring vapor, liquids, and solids in transmission or diffuse reflection and a wide range of general process applications such as chemical/petrochemical manufacturing. The flexible platform accommodates both fiber-to-detector and direct-to-detector sampling configurations. The IntegraSpec XL products also include a comprehensive set of documentation.
